title: Coral kingdom
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Noel Monkman
brief_description: The fish and corals of the Great Barrier Reef. Photographed underwater, the film shows many different shell fish and corals; box fish, king schnapper, seaworm, jellyfish, anemones and other sea creatures.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Noel Monkman
